Posts.Content: Hi, I don't have advice for you but just wanted you to know that as a recipient of this CancerCompass newsletter (I am my mom's health/cancer care advocate; she was treated at CTCA in Zion, IL), I have prayed for your friend and you. That's all I wanted you to know. Be strong and be vigilent. Hope and healing are around every turn.
Posts.Title: Return Cancer
